metadata.title: CVE-2021-25290 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in Pillow before 8.1.1. In TiffDecode.c, there is anegative-offset memcpy with an invalid size.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-25290` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

python-imaging - 3.1.2-0ubuntu1.6
python-pil - 3.1.2-0ubuntu1.6
python-pil.imagetk - 3.1.2-0ubuntu1.6
python3-pil - 3.1.2-0ubuntu1.6
python3-pil.imagetk - 3.1.2-0ubuntu1.6
No subscription required

criterions.comment: pillow package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.1.2-0ubuntu1.6').
